data: {"generalSituation":"A fresh easterly airstream will affect the coast of Guangdong today and tomorrow. With the easterly airstream moderating over the weekend, it will be warm during the day over Guangdong. It will be relatively humid in the morning and at night. A fresh to strong northeast monsoon is expected to affect southern China early to midweek next week. It will be cloudier with slightly cooler weather over the region.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260212","week":"Thursday","forecastWind":"East force 4 to 5.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy.
